Get ready to explore an awesome world of mining with Jack- The miner.

THE STORY LINE

Jack is a specially designed robot, sent by humans, to dig out the most precious metal on an alien planet but he requires refueling and repairing.One of the best digger games is awaiting you to make smart decisions and control this hero smartly.

MANAGE YOUR RESOURCES SMARTLY

Spend all your ores in the market to buy upgrades or to buy resources for your Jack, making it easy for Jack to mine in this captivating miner game. You can choose to buy resources from teleport to nuclear blast to make your way to the final precious metal. How well you manage your spending on upgrades or buy resources to mine the precious ore, depends on you.


JACK THE MINER FEATURES

- Auto save each time you sell items.
- Highly Addictive gameplay.
- 50+ missions.
- 12 Different ore to mine.
- 20+ upgrades for your Jack.
- Extra life saving stuff hidden.
- Map to route your way.
- Awesome HD graphics.
- Restart new game any time.
